participant_abstract.sent: Although it is still early in the design process, I feel we are off to a good start.
We started off with a general over view of the project goals, design method and fiscal positioning and then gave a general ice-breaker and introduction to the other team members.

With the remaining time we managed to brainstorm some ideas for the new design - what we are looking for, some new directions we might be able to take and some innovative strategies to corner the market.
For my part I am interested to see what sort of fuctions we can cater the remote to for the greatest general appeal.
As television is a huge part of any demographic, we have the chance to come up with a profitable innovative design that could be used the world over.

participant_actions.sent: The designers are brainstorming function and design features, and we are all brainstorming concept elements and options for the remote.
At the next meeting we'll compare and get a better handle on what direction we are headed in.

participant_decisions.sent: To brainstorm in all areas of design.
To come back with some general guidelines about our goals with this product .
To reconsider the final sale price of the remote and our profit margins.
I personally will look into user requirements before our next meeting .
